com.netflix.servo.publish.cloudwatch

Class CloudWatchMetricObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.servo.publish.BaseMetricObserver
      • com.netflix.servo.publish.cloudwatch.CloudWatchMetricObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.servo.publish.MetricObserver

    public class CloudWatchMetricObserver
extends com.netflix.servo.publish.BaseMetricObserver
    Writes observations to Amazon's CloudWatch.

public CloudWatchMetricObserver(java.lang.String name,

        Parameters:
        name - Unique name of the observer.
        namespace - Namespace to use in CloudWatch.
        credentials - Amazon credentials.
        batchSize - Batch size to send to Amazon. They currently enforce a max of 20.
